reviews.text: What a unique and absolutely delicious dish. Loved it so much! Thank you for introducing us to this delicacy from Vidarbha, Radina!❤️
reviews.author: Anuradha S

reviews.text: Really tasty @⁨Radina⁩. Tasted this dish for the first time.
reviews.author: Aditi Agarwal

reviews.text: Very tasty sambarvadi. Thank you Radina
reviews.author: Madhvi

reviews.text: Super delicious Sambarvadis.. this was the first time I had them. They were very flavourful and left us wanting for more❤️❤️. Thank you @⁨Radina⁩ !
reviews.author: Megha
